RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 76. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $6,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since April 24 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEAT THE DEALER just off leader to far turn, headed that one at the eighth pole, dug in gamely to prevail on the wire. DR. ZARNETT sprinted to a length lead to far turn, dueled stretch, out gamed in the final stages. PLATE IT UP close up early on, dropped back to far turn, raced on for the show.spot HONOR THE D tracked top pair to the stretch, faltered in the late going. MURRY SPUR could not keep up from inside and dropped far back in stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Murry Spur
ENTRY.COMMENT: could not keep up from inside and dropped far back in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Zarnett
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted to a length lead to far turn, dueled stretch, outgamed

ENTRY.NAME: Plate It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up early on, dropped back to far turn, back on for show

ENTRY.NAME: Beat the Dealer
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leader to far turn, headed that one eighth pole, dug in

ENTRY.NAME: Honor the D
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked top pair to the stretch, faltered in the late going

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANDY WALKS WITH ME sprinted to the front quickly, stayed game in the stretch under steady handling and held on. ARNO chased to the turn, stayed on inside through the stretch run but outgamed to wire while best of the rest. FLAGSTONE tried to keep up to the turn while evenly for show spot. VAMOS ANTONIO chased top pair to the stretch, leveled off late, no late gain. GO LITTLE ROCKSTAR always trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Go Little Rockstar
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Andy Walks With Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted to the front quickly, stayed game in stretch, held on

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Elaine M. Vinson & Lee E. Vinson

ENTRY.NAME: Flagstone
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to the turn while evenly for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Vamos Antonio
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to the stretch, leveled off late, no late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Arno
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased to turn, stayed on inside stretch run, outgamed to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 24, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KNIGHT'S CROSS quick to the front, well handled throughout proving tons the best while easily to the finish. ARTEMUS EAGLE chased winner to no avail while holding the place spot. GOTSOMEMOJO inside trip while never a menace settling for show dough. TORNADO BOY never factored throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Knight's Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the front, well handled throughout, tons the best easily

ENTRY.NAME: Gotsomemojo
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip while never a menace settling for show dough

ENTRY.NAME: Artemus Eagle
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to no avail while holding the place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Tornado Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 24 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY GRASS IS BLUE showed speed to the front while well handled to go clear while ridden out. FAST FELIX awkward start with an inside chase and could not keep up while no match and best of the rest. ROAD MINISTER off rail while racing evenly throughout for the show spot. CHROME'S RIGHT broke a bit tardy and never menaced throughout. SUPER BROTHER never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Felix
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside chase, could not keep up while no match, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: My Grass Is Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, well handled to go clear while ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Chrome's Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke a bit tardy, never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Super Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: never threatened

ENTRY.NAME: Road Minister
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail while racing evenly throughout for show spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 5F Turf CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this ra ce will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TROUBLE MAKING inside speed to the front, well handled throughout stayed clear. POINT WELL TAKEN chased winner throughout while no match, best of the other one. MORE THAN ROSES broke awkward from the gate and always trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Trouble Making
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, well handled throughout stayed clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Rebel Racing LLC, Rowland Hancock & David Walker

ENTRY.NAME: Point Well Taken
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner throughout while no match, best of the other one

ENTRY.NAME: More Than Roses
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkward from the gate and always trailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET MOBILTEE quick outside speed, dueled to quarter pole, roused to go clear in the final furlong under stout handling. WHYNAUGHTY broke a bit tardy, rushed inside to duel winner, could not stay on and held the place spot. KISS THE RED HEAD no speed to the turn, came widest into stretch while rallied on late for show spot. SISSY'S MAY unhurried to the turn, improved position only in the stretch run. EMERALD EYES raced along evenly throughout with no late kick in the stretch run. DESDEMONA KAY broke slow and never menaced thereafter. HEIDI'S SHADOW tried to keep up for the half but gave way readily in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Desdemona Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slow and never menaced thereafter

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss the Red Head
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to turn, widest into stretch while coming on late

ENTRY.NAME: Whynaughty
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy, rushed inside to duel winner, could not stay, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Sissy's May
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the turn, improved position in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi's Shadow
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up for the half, gave way readily in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Emerald Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout with no late kick in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Mobiltee
ENTRY.OWNER: Mark D Kuntz LLC and McKenzie Andrew
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick outside speed, dueled to quarter pole, roused to go clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 5F Turf CR: 77. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $6,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 24, 2023 Allo wed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRANITE CANDY quick inside speed to front while well handled while ridden out to the wire. BLUE LILY pressed winner to the turn, rallied three wide through the stretch for place spot late. SOFIA STRONG bit tardy from gate, inside run into the stretch but outgamed for place. LUCKY US always trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Granite Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick inside speed to front well handled while ridden out to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Sofia Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy from gate, inside run into stretch, outgamed for place

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Us
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Lily
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed winner to turn, rallied three wide for place spot late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 24, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COTIA inside speed from the gate to stay clear in stretch while well handled to the wire. POQUITO ROSE broke sharp from the gate, raced along three wide along for place spot. FIVE QUEENS off rail to the turn, rallied widest into the stretch run, outgamed for place. DANCE THE DAY AWAY no speed from outside to the turn, improved position in stretch. CELESTIAL ORB inside position to the stretch, no ate gain in the drive. HERO OF THE BEST speed between horses, tried to keep up to turn, gave way readily. GENERAL GINNY awkward break from gate, never menaced thereafter.

ENTRY.NAME: Celestial Orb
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside position to the stretch, no ate gain in the drive

ENTRY.NAME: General Ginny
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward break from gate, never menaced thereafter

ENTRY.NAME: Cotia
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed from the gate to stay clear in stretch well handled

ENTRY.NAME: Hero of the Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between horses, tried to keep up to turn, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Poquito Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp from the gate, raced along three wide for place

ENTRY.NAME: Five Queens
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail to the turn, came widest into stretch outgamed for place

ENTRY.NAME: Dance the Day Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed from outside to the turn, improved position in stretch
